profile.name: Brendan Eich
profile.bio: Founder & CEO, Brave Software. Created JavaScript. Co-founded Mozilla and Firefox.

analysis.career_trajectory: Started with JavaScript in 2010, exploring various projects such as a meta-circular interpreter (narcissus), a falsey object for Node.js (nil), and presentations at Strange Loop 2012 and BrazilJS 2015. They also contributed to the development of the EcmaScript SIMD numeric type (ecmascript_simd) and worked on the website source code (website). More recently, they created a gh-pages home page (detritus).

comment_analytics.communication_style: Asks thoughtful questions, provides constructive feedback

match_profile.similar_user_traits: A detail-oriented developer with a strong background in language design and software development.
conversation_starters: What inspired you to work on the EcmaScript SIMD numeric type?
Can you walk me through your process for creating a gh-pages home page?
How do you approach debugging complex JavaScript issues?
